item.title: Fedora on the HP Envy 15 1067NR
item.description: A collection of Fedora 20 optimisations for my current setup (the SSD in a OCZ Vertez 3 120Go). Notice that most of my tweaks come from fedy, an excellent open source tool that does pretty much everything needed to get a more user friendly OS.
